solution_line_template: The total amount of money saved is ${june_saved} + ${july_saved} + ${august_saved} = $<<{june_saved}+{july_saved}+{august_saved}={total_saved}>>{total_saved}.
The total amount spent on books and new shoes is ${spent_on_books} + ${spent_on_shoes} = $<<{spent_on_books}+{spent_on_shoes}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}.
